mapper.sql: id, name, resume, set_up_time, possess_by, Incumbent, nature, pic_url, create_time, update_time

update.foreach: INSERT INTO t_cultural_organ (id, name, resume, set_up_time, possess_by, incumbent, nature,pic_url,create_time,update_time) VALUES (#{item.id},#{item.name},#{item.resume},#{item.setUpTime},#{item.possessBy},#{item.incumbent},#{item.nature},#{item.picUrl},now(),now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name=#{item.name},resume=#{item.resume},set_up_time=#{item.setUpTime},possess_by=#{item.possessBy},incumbent=#{item.incumbent} ,nature=#{item.nature},pic_url=#{item.picUrl},update_time=now()

mapper.select:
select t.id,t.name,t.resume,t.set_up_time,t.possess_by,t.incumbent,t.pic_url,d.label as nature from t_cultural_organ t left join t_dict d on (t.nature=d.`value` and d.type='organ_nature') where 1=1
and t.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and d.label like CONCAT('%',#{nature},'%')
and t.setUpTime like CONCAT('%',#{setUpTime},'%')
and t.incumbent like CONCAT('%',#{incumbent},'%')
and t.possessBy like CONCAT('%',#{possessBy},'%')
and t.resume like CONCAT('%',#{resume},'%')
LIMIT ${(pageNo-1)*3},3

select t.id,t.name,t.resume,t.set_up_time,t.possess_by,t.incumbent,t.pic_url,d.label as nature from t_cultural_organ t left join t_dict d on (t.nature=d.`value` and d.type='organ_nature') where t.id=#{id}
SELECT d.label,count(t.nature = d.`value` OR NULL) as num FROM t_dict d LEFT JOIN t_cultural_organ t ON t.nature = d.`value` where d.type = 'organ_nature' GROUP BY d.label
